name: RuboCop Completion
description:
Autocompletion and validation of RuboCop configuration files, and inline enable/disable/todo directives.

Your Gemfile.lock is used to determine RuboCop and extension versions, so you should always have the right list of cops.

The rubocop-schema-gen gem is used to generate schemas from RuboCop's documentation.

Press CTRL + SPACE (or your configured shortcut key) to activate completion while typing.
notes:
Fixed

  • Made installation of rubocop-schema-gen gem more reliable, especially on macOS.

Added

  • Support for all versions of rubocop(-*) gems, not just the most recent 30 versions.

Changed

  • Only check for/install the rubocop-schema-gen gem once per process.
  • Updated README.
